sentences.en: "Performance" is undoubtedly one of the most surreal movies ever made.
sentences.cn: 《迷幻演出》无疑是有史以来最离奇的电影之一。

sentences.en: Considering rules of engagement for war - at - a - distance raises a surreal set of questions.
sentences.cn: 为远距作战而审视新的规则引起了一系列超现实的问题.

sentences.en: If this sounds surreal, let me refine last statement.
sentences.cn: 如果这听上去有些超现实, 那么让我来提炼一下最后一句吧.

sentences.en: In Europe and the Pacific surreal and line against the Axis forces.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲和太平洋地区的超现实前线和轴心国力量对战.

sentences.en: It is a very surreal experience.
sentences.cn: 这是一种十分莫名其妙的经历.

sentences.en: It must have made for a surreal experience!
sentences.cn: 这造成了一种超现实的体验.

sentences.en: The atmosphere borders on the surreal.
The color change will give the photo a surreal and mysterious look.
sentences.cn: 色调的更换将给予照片一种神秘超写实的视感.

sentences.en: The house was a surreal mixture of opulence and decay.
sentences.cn: 这座房子破落中透着奢华，犹如幻梦一般。

sentences.en: The same slightly surreal atmosphere obtains across the world of investment.
sentences.cn: 在投资领域出现了同样的略有些超现实的氛围.

sentences.en: The terrifically surreal sets in this comic and touching film are wonderful.
sentences.cn: 极度超现实的场景为这部感人的喜剧增添科幻的色彩.

sentences.en: They underwent that abnormal time with no complaint , revealing some surreal forbearance in a real life.
sentences.cn: 他们承受了过去那个非正常的时代而无言, 在平凡的生活中体现出了不平凡的隐忍的力量.
这感觉真是太不真实了.

sentences.en: This was definitely the most surreal gig I've ever done.
sentences.cn: 这无疑是我做过的最超现实主义的一次表演.

sentences.en: We were slightly interested in more surreal situations - going on location and shooting on film.
sentences.cn: 我们都有点喜欢处于超现实的位置 —— 去到什么地方决定拍什么东西.

words.tran_cn: 超现实主义的；离奇的；不真实的

trans.tran_en: a situation or experience that is surreal is very strange and difficult to understand, like something from a dream
